column1: @MarinaSBlinova Rocket boost stage reaching 0 m/s in one piece :) Will know soon. Odds not high.
Last known state for rocket boost stage is 360 m/s, Mach 1.1, 8.5 km altitude and roll rate close to zero (v important!)
Orbit insertion and Dragon deploy all good. Falcon reentry burn also good. Waiting for landing data from tracking plane.
Falcon 9-Reusable with (now retired) Grasshopper test rig in background http://t.co/TmYrs5mm79

column1: @erwinEmm Need to make sure precision return from hypersonic velocity works in ocean before transitioning to land
Heavy seas in Atlantic preventing our recovery ship from being on station. Maybe they can help? http://t.co/9zZKAqPh6H
This is 1st ever orbital rocket launch w landing legs. Will attempt leg deploy &amp
